thread.title: 14-Year-Old Designer Artfully Pairs Hand-Lettered Words With Striking Images
thread.title_full: 14-Year-Old Designer Artfully Pairs Hand-Lettered Words With Striking Images

title: 14-Year-Old Designer Artfully Pairs Hand-Lettered Words With Striking Images
text: 14-Year-Old Designer Artfully Pairs Hand-Lettered Words With Striking Images By Dorothy Tan , 09 Feb 2017 Subscribe to newsletter Like us on Facebook Judging from his work, you would be surprised to find that designer and entrepreneur Ted Bettridge is just 14 years old. Having been hand-lettering for two years—which means that he started at the ripe old age of 12—Bettridge also has a precocious talent for pairing his lettering work with found images that seem to go perfectly together. According to the UK-based young designer, he is opened for commission and would like to invite you to work with him—check out his portfolio here . You can also follow him on Instagram to keep up with his work.
